issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Refactor TableProvider to return thread-safe BatchIterator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6287](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6287). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This refactor is a step towards implementing the new query execution that supports partitions and parallel execution.

comments.body:
